speech.p: It may assist the House to know that after the state opening of Parliament next week, I intend to make a formal announcement about the arrangements for the election of Deputy Speakers. The date for the election is likely to be Tuesday 23 July, with nominations to be submitted in the Table Office between 10 am and 5 pm on Monday 22 July. I have asked for a provisional briefing note about the election to be made available in the Vote Office, along with nomination forms. I will provide more information, including about the timings and location of the ballot, when I make the formal announcement next week. Next week, the House will also be invited to appoint a number of Members to serve as Deputy Speakers, to cover until the election process is complete.
The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by law:
